mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password, role, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
